intro.content: Create your own digital profile as a private cargo and bus driver.

about.description1: Kolivan is a digital profile platform that allows private truck and bus drivers to create their own digital profiles and access a broader customer base.
about.description2: Finding the right transportation vehicle can be time-consuming. When you need to transport your cargo or passengers, the process often involves multiple phone calls and discussions, sometimes not even knowing how to find the right vehicle. Kolivan creates conditions for customers to find suitable transportation and driver profiles by entering their requirements into the platform.

service1.description: If you find it challenging to find a cargo vehicle and driver that suits your cargo, you can use this service to quickly find a cargo vehicle and driver profile that matches your cargo.

service2.description: If you struggle to find a bus for tours and travels, this service is perfect for you. You can easily find the right bus and driver profile using the search feature.

service3.description: With this service, as a driver, you create your own digital profile and gain access to a broader customer base.

whyus.description: You can choose us based on the following features. We're always at your service. You're in the right place for safe and quality service.

feature1.description: Reducing your calls up to 5 times will save your budget. This way, you can find transportation with just one click.

feature2.description: Just enter what you need into the platform. The results will be shown based on your input.

feature3.description: For customers, there is a driver rating system. With this feature, you can choose the best driver for yourself.

feature4.description: We always consider our customers and do our best for their satisfaction.

step1.paragraph: As a customer, choose a category and submit the order.

step2.paragraph: As a driver, you will see the order from the customer and accept the job that suits you.

step3.header: Track Your Cargo and Passenger Transport Process
step3.paragraph: Drivers and customers will track the journey in real-time.

info.title: For more information, contact us
info.description: You can contact us for more information. All your questions will be answered.

question1.title: What is Kolivan?
question1.content: Kolivan is a platform that connects private cargo and passenger vehicle owners with customers. It simplifies the process of finding transportation services for cargo and passenger transportation.

question2.title: Is Kolivan available for both cargo and passenger transportation?
question2.content: Yes, Kolivan caters to both cargo and passenger transportation needs, providing optimal solutions for various transportation requirements.

question3.title: What are the benefits of using Kolivan?
question3.content: By using Kolivan, customers can easily find transportation services without numerous calls and discussions. Additionally, vehicle owners can connect with a large customer base, maximizing their earning potential.

question4.title: How does Kolivan work?
question4.content: Kolivan utilizes advanced AI models to analyze various factors such as location, cargo/passenger type, and available vehicles. It then offers the most suitable transportation solutions based on customer requirements.
